definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: I still keep in touch with my cousins in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 我和我在英国的表亲们还着。

sentences.english: Her male cousins had hardly prepared her for a contretemps with a man she desired.
sentences.chinese: 就她想要的男人，她的男表亲不希望她有挫折。

sentences.english: That is another cousin. His name is Edgar.
sentences.chinese: 那是另一位表亲，他的名字叫埃德加。

sentences.english: I still keep in touch with my cousins.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的表亲们仍然保持联系。

sentences.english: His cousinly love must have been greater than his passion.
sentences.chinese: 他的表亲情谊一定是大于他自己的激情。

sentences.english: The old rascal has promised his daughter to a cousin of the Seixas.
sentences.chinese: 那个老混蛋，把女儿许配给了赛克萨斯家的一个表亲。

sentences.english: They are both cousins of his, but not of the same degree of propinquity .
sentences.chinese: 他们两个都是他的表亲，但在血统上亲疏不同。

sentences.english: She says, I am the great great grand cousin of the queen of France.
sentences.chinese: 她说，我是法兰西皇后的远远远房表亲。

sentences.english: Disappointment’s cousin is frustration, the second storm.
sentences.chinese: 沮丧是失望的表亲，他们总是形影相随。

sentences.english: Anti-terrorism gave way to its much more potent cousin, anti-insurgency.
sentences.chinese: 反恐让路给了其更有力的表亲，平叛。

sentences.english: Sundry other cousins. They exchange hugs with him.
sentences.chinese: 一些其他的表亲，他们轮着拥抱了他。

sentences.english: Yet artificial life suffers from the same malaise that afflicts its cousin, artificial intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 然而，人工生命跟它的表亲人工智能有着同样的弊病。

sentences.english: Brothers and sisters are closely related whereas cousins are collateral relatives .
sentences.chinese: 兄弟姐妹是近亲而表亲只是旁系亲属。

sentences.english: They sat down to meat with a distant cousin of the house.
sentences.chinese: 他们便坐下来，同一个远房表亲一起用饭。

sentences.english: Me, whose first wife had been a cousin of the Prince of Pentos.
sentences.chinese: 我，第一个妻子是潘托斯王子表亲的男人。

sentences.english: Mary is not coming; she is sewed up with her cousin from London.
sentences.chinese: 玛俐不来了，她正忙于应酬伦敦来的表亲。

definition: older male cousin via female line
(of siblings) having the same father but different mothers/half (brother or sister)
